function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of centralized document access and communication may lead to inconsistent understanding of protective measures and infection transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission among employees and guests.","Mitigation":"Establish a centralized platform for document access and regular communication to ensure consistent understanding and compliance with protective measures.","Technologies":"Internal communication tools and document management systems.","People":"Employees, guests, management.","Owner":"Resort management and HR team."},{"Description":"Potential breach of confidential medical information and biased decision-making based on medical conditions may lead to legal and ethical implications.","Impact":"Legal and ethical repercussions, erosion of employee trust and morale.","Mitigation":"Ensure strict adherence to Health Protection Agencies and local ministry regulations, provide training on confidentiality and sensitivity, and implement unbiased decision-making processes.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure databases, and decision-making algorithms.","People":"Employees, management.","Owner":"Resort management and HR team."},{"Description":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","Impact":"Decreased employee morale, engagement, and productivity.","Mitigation":"Prioritize recovery efforts that address physiological, safety, and social needs before focusing on higher-level employee needs. Provide support and resources for employees' basic needs.","Technologies":"Employee well-being surveys, feedback systems, and resource allocation tools.","People":"Employees, HR team, leadership team.","Owner":"Resort management and HR team."}]}
